We still have tickets available for this fabulous event!

Helping Hands for Freedom Puts on Freedom To Rock EventHelping Hands for Freedom is a nation-wide nonprofit organization that helps support military children and families facing loss, injury, and deployment. One of the events that Helping Hands for Freedom is putting on is called Freedom to Rock. Proceeds for this event will benefit children and families of our heroes that have put their lives on the line for our country.Freedom to Rock will be a night full of awesome 80’s music, live auctions, food, and comedy. Again, the proceeds for Freedom to Rock directly helps the families of our heroes!visit https://lnkd.in/gx4eGab

Jane Gordon is one of those rare resources that you tuck away in a safe spot that can be accessed at a moments notice. Her experience speaks for itself and her personality is one of a kind, kind being the key word. Even with her wealth of knowledge she treats everyone with respect and her ultimate goal is to always get results while making the journey unforgettable. A humble "rockstar" who works with...actual rockstars!

summary: Jane has collaborated with major entertainment and sports organizations, celebrities, media and major brands, consistently creating profitable marketing partnerships and developing a wide array of revenue generating projects – including multi-media campaigns, public relations campaigns, charity concerts, golf tournaments, celebrity fundraisers, and special events.With a strong and diverse background in broadcast, web and live event production as well as public relations and social media, Jane’s experience as a writer and producer plays an integral role in her personal, focused and accountable approach to achieving her client’s vision.Directly responsible for all marketing, public relations, social media and production for Rock & Roll Hall of Fame musician Alice Cooper’s nonprofit organization Solid Rock, Jane has developed strategic marketing partnerships with major corporate sponsors and entertainment celebrities, delivering sold-out audiences and substantial ROI to the bottom line of the charities and sponsors involved.Among the celebrities, athletes, and brands whom Jane has worked with on marketing campaigns and events include rock legends Mike Campbell with Tom Petty and the Heartbreakers, Jackson Browne, Jeff Lynne, KISS, Vince Neil, Joan Jett, and Don Felder; film and television celebrities Johnny Depp, Cheech Marin, John O’Hurley, Larry the Cable Guy, Tom Arnold, and Frankie Muniz; sports legends Johnny Bench, Danny White, Emmett Smith, Bruce Jenner, Bob Brenly, and Randy Johnson; and major  brands The PGA Tour Club, Harley-Davidson, Cox Communications, Quintess Residences of the World, Blue Cross Blue Shield of Arizona, Callaway Golf, Fender, and more.
